"Fangular at 2012-06-11 15:17 CET:
Hi agai twentyforty.. as always, it's good to see you here :-)

I was just wondering if you were open to requests at the moment? If so, I'm looking for a version of the movie 'Snabba Cash' that isn;t a massive file and that has English subtitles.. I've been looking for it for a while but so far, no luck.

So if you have the movie and the time, I would love to see it.. but either way, hope you have a great week and thanks again for all the fantastic uploads.

Cheers"

Hi 2040
my account is blocked in sceneunderground...
It is displaying: This account has been disabled by an administrator: This account has been disabled by an administrator.
My account name is dkhere..
Can you please check on it?

@dkhere: Your account was auto-disabled after "Ratio Too Low" and System warnings.

Dry201 enabled your account, but please - it cannot be tolerated in the future. You must either seed back or try to seed back keeping downloaded torrents active for a long(er) periods.

On ANY private site "Cleaning after downloads" and "Hit & Run" always ends with a permanent ban.

So - keep torrents active or make one of the measures against "Ratio Low" come true - as I explained on SU  Forum.
@2040: So inorder to keep the ratio, i need to upload also right?
Twentyforty - thank you SO much!! Am so excited and very grateful - you're a legend - thank you, thank you, thank you!!!!
Martin Scorsese is a great fan. He's getting it released in the US as Easy Money.
